description: Name for the profile. Must begin with a letter, number, or the underscore character (_), and must contain only letters, numbers, and the hyphen (-), period (.), pound (#), space ( ), at (@), equals (=), colon (:), and underscore (_) characters. Cannot be changed after the profile is added.
The following requirement applies only to the Citrix ADC CLI:
If the name includes one or more spaces, enclose the name in double or single quotation marks (for example, "my profile" or 'my profile').
Name of JSON config file which have static signature details.
URL that Bot protection uses as the Error URL.
Any comments about the purpose of profile, or other useful information about the profile.
